title: Rosie the Riveter WWII Home Front National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        Ranger Jessica demonstrates the interactive welding for students        Bring Your Students  The Visitor Education Center is a great place to bring your students on a field trip. There are many education opportunities that allow teachers to share an important part of American history. There are interactive exhibits, educational videos and ranger programs. In order to accommodate classes, we require that teachers make a reservation. Please call the front desk at 510-232-5050, and speak with the education coordinator.          Students pose with the Rosie the Riveter figure in the Visitor Education Center
